Description: Untested All items sold as is,Few hours home playing time on this (for real, original crap strings), 25 more guitars to be posted for sale: no reserve, most are like this- pretty much new, all have some minor flaw/ding or other- I will describe flaws. these are tough to photograph- glare, reflections, dust, fingerprints...but they will polish nice. Photo shows condition- took few angles to reduce glare questions. Beautiful thru- construction Korean Made guitar. Tiny ding in back. Needs polish, have some tarnish. Look at my pics, you can see the dust. there is no wear on the frets. Very good bang for buck on this. The Schecter Hellraiser Special Solo-6 lives up to its name completely. This Hellraiser 6 was designed for loud, heavy metal music. Just a few power chords on the Hellraiser and you will know that no other tonewood conveys dark tones like solid mahogany. The 3-piece set mahogany neck with an Ultra Access heel design gives you total access to the 24-fret rosewood fingerboard. Fitted with an EMG Active 81 and EMG 85 Active pickup in the neck position, the Schecter Hellraiser Solo-6 gives you an amazing sound palette to work with. Its through-the-body string routing gives you even more sustain. Sweet aesthetic touches include dagger fingerboard inlays and black chrome hardware. Check the drop-down menu to the right to select colors and/or other options.FEATURESConstruction: Set-neck with Ultra AccessBody: Mahogany (quilted maple top on black cherry model)Neck: 3-piece mahoganyNeck joint: Ultra AccessScale: 24.75"Fingerboard: rosewoodFrets: 24 extra-jumboInlays: DaggerNut: Graph Tech TusqBridge Pickup: EMG 81 active humbuckerNeck Pickup: EMG 85 active humbuckerElectronics: Vol/Vol/Tone/3-way switchBridge: Tune-o-matic with thru-body string mountsTuners: SchecterHardware: black chromeCase: sold separately Buy it, play it, spark some new creativity, take care of it, get bored with it, sell it for what you paid. Keep the boxes. Whatever gets you to play !
